page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: We visited 4 farms.The first one we visited was{RathoMains},this was owned by Mr P.Barry and relied mainly on a dairy herd of approx. 60 Friesians.He has 230 acres of land,and grows mainly wheat and barley,also trying out peas and rapeseed.Since the new milk quota he now produces 20% less milk than he did in 1982.He has 4 tractors and shares a combine harvestor with {Freelands}farm.Freelands is run by J.Muir and owns 225 acres.He grows turnips,wheat,barley and has about 60 bullocks which he fattens up and sells at the slaughter market.He has two men who help him and also has 4 tractors.{Ransfield}farm is owned by J.Lawrie who has 240 acres which is mainly taking up by potatoes,barley wheat and grass.He has two men,4 tractors and 100 freisians.He also has severe drainage problems on some land.
